ComicInfo.Summary:
Turok discovers the greatest mystery of the Lost Valley is ... Turok himself?! Stunning revelations abound as Turok learns the long-buried truth about the Lost Valley, and about himself. Now he just has to live long enough to escape this time-lost land and the fate waiting for him thanks to the bounty hunter who has doggedly pursued him. Oh, and dinosaurs too! More prehistoric peril by Ron Marz and Roberto Castro!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Rags Morales (a) & Jorge Sutil (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Butch Guice (a) & Dan Brown (c) | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Rags Morales | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Butch Guice | 4 | E/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Rags Morales (a) & Jorge Sutil (c) | 5 | F/RI | 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Butch Guice (a) & Dan Brown (c) | 6 |
